title: Not receiving blue essence mission
body:
I've seen people around me getting a mission that rewards people for last season, but I haven't gotten a mission for it.
This is the mission I'm talking about:
https://imgur.com/a/tzAeN

Is it just going to take time for riot to give me the mission, or is this a problem that I may need to contact rito about?

replies.body: Hello I know for a fact I have bought rune pages with RP, and I have spent countless hours on league of legends, and I haven't received any of my awards, so whats going on league?
That mission is there to convert all of your old runes into BE for the new system. It doesn't look like you had ever bought runes that would have qualified for the refunds.
I know for a fact I purchased runes. I remember buying them on sale when they were 10 ip each. And I spent over 6300 ip on the runes.

Runes purchased after the price drop don't count towards the refund since they were bought so cheap to begin with.

https://youtu.be/Yq2i6RDmbNc?t=4m36s
Same here dude it said I got like 200k essence but have no received it yet, only a flat 15k from participating in the old rune system, let me know if you got the 15k.
